about_the_game:
Kamti is proud to announce COOKS, THIEVES, WIVES, AND LOVERS, the first expansion for THE BOOK OF BONDMAIDS.

This expansion will introduce several new areas and characters, including the new Bondmaid and three brand new quests, each of which take place during the events of the main game but accessible to players who have already completed it.

LA GAZZA LADRA – Hero falls in with a scheming kitchen maid who is far more than she appears.


LOVERS LAMENT – Hero meets the Bondmaid Lena’s lover Bella and unravels the tragic story that led to their deaths.


FLESH AND BONE – Hero is tasked with tracking down a rampaging beast, but can’t do it alone…


In addition, the game will be updated with new music, artwork, and seven new outfits for the Princess.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains sex scenes with full nudity.
BDSM, LGBT, Heterosexual scenes.

detailed_description:
CURRENTLY WORK ON:


About the Game

Kamti is proud to announce COOKS, THIEVES, WIVES, AND LOVERS, the first expansion for THE BOOK OF BONDMAIDS.

This expansion will introduce several new areas and characters, including the new Bondmaid and three brand new quests, each of which take place during the events of the main game but accessible to players who have already completed it.

LA GAZZA LADRA – Hero falls in with a scheming kitchen maid who is far more than she appears.


LOVERS LAMENT – Hero meets the Bondmaid Lena’s lover Bella and unravels the tragic story that led to their deaths.


FLESH AND BONE – Hero is tasked with tracking down a rampaging beast, but can’t do it alone…


In addition, the game will be updated with new music, artwork, and seven new outfits for the Princess.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 2.2GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 3850 or NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GS
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Supporting DirectX
